question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Feature flags] Can initial_features_override enable dangerous features at genesis (like disabled signature verification), compromising chain security from the start? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Randomness config] Can randomness_config_override be manipulated to use predictable randomness, enabling validator selection attacks or consensus manipulation? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [JWK consensus] Can jwk_consensus_config_override inject malicious JWK configurations that compromise keyless account security or enable authentication bypass? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Initial JWKs] Can initial_jwks contain malicious or expired JWKs that allow unauthorized access to keyless accounts from genesis? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Groth16 VK] Can keyless_groth16_vk be a malformed or backdoored verification key that allows forging of keyless account proofs and unauthorized fund access? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_waypoint()] [Waypoint mismatch] Can the waypoint generated from genesis differ from the actual state root after executing genesis, causing validator startup failures or chain splits? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_waypoint()] [Temp storage] Does using TempPath for AptosDB creation on line 170 ensure proper cleanup, or can leftover state files cause waypoint regeneration to produce different results? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_waypoint()] [Database corruption] Can concurrent waypoint generation attempts write to the same TempPath, causing database corruption and incorrect waypoint calculation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_waypoint()] [Storage config] Are the storage configurations (NO_OP_STORAGE_PRUNER_CONFIG, RocksdbConfigs::default()) on lines 174-175 appropriate for genesis, or could they cause state commitment errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_waypoint()] [Indexer disabled] Does setting indexer to false on line 176 affect waypoint calculation, potentially causing mismatches with validators running with indexer enabled? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_waypoint()] [Error propagation] Are all database initialization errors properly propagated from lines 171-180, or can silent failures lead to incorrect waypoint generation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Gas manipulation] Can gas_schedule be set with zero costs for expensive operations, enabling DoS attacks through gas-free computation that exhausts validator resources? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Gas overflow] Can gas_schedule values overflow during arithmetic operations in the VM, causing incorrect gas metering and infinite loops? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Gas consistency] Is the gas_schedule used consistently across all genesis initialization, or can mismatches cause transaction execution failures post-genesis? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Consensus safety] Can consensus_config be set with invalid safety parameters (e.g., 0 timeout, 100% Byzantine tolerance), compromising AptosBFT safety guarantees? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Consensus liveness] Can consensus_config have extremely long timeouts that cause the network to fail to reach consensus, resulting in total loss of liveness? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Consensus mismatch] Can different validators use different consensus_config values, causing immediate consensus failure and network partition at genesis? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Execution limits] Can execution_config disable transaction size limits or gas limits, enabling bloated transactions that cause state bloat or validator resource exhaustion? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Parallelism] Can execution_config set invalid parallelism parameters that cause race conditions in Block-STM parallel execution? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_genesis_txn()] [Execution determinism] Are execution_config settings guaranteed to produce deterministic results across all validators, or can subtle differences cause state divergence? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: new()] [Conversion errors] What happens when ValidatorConfiguration conversion fails on line 96 - is the entire genesis rejected, or can partial validator sets be created? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: new()] [Validator limit] Is there a maximum number of validators that can be included, or can an attacker create a genesis with millions of validators causing memory exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Function: new()] [Stake distribution] Can validator stake amounts sum to u64::MAX, causing overflow in total stake calculations used for voting power? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Clone safety] Is GenesisInfo Clone implementation safe, or can cloning with cached genesis lead to shared mutable state that causes race conditions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/lib.rs] [Struct: GenesisInfo] [Deep clone] Are all cloned fields (framework, validators, configs) deep cloned, or can shallow clones cause aliasing issues where modifications affect multiple GenesisInfo instances? (Medium)
